example.code: Remove-APSUser -UserName TestUser@lab.com -AuthenticationType USERPOOL Confirm Are you sure you want to perform this action? Performing the operation "Remove-APSUser (DeleteUser)" on target "TestUser@lab.com". [Y] Yes [A] Yes to All [N] No [L] No to All [S] Suspend [?] Help (default is "Y"): A
example.description: This sample deletes a user from USERPOOL
